dublinCore.dc:title: 114 S1584 IS: Renewable Fuel Standard Repeal Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Cassidy introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works

form.official-title: To repeal the renewable fuel standard

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Renewable Fuel Standard Repeal Act.

subsection.text: Section 211 of the Clean Air Act (42 U.S.C. 7545) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in paragraphs (1) and (2), by striking (n), or (o) each place it appears and inserting or (n); and
in paragraph (1), in the second sentence, by striking (m), or (o) and inserting or (m);

paragraph.text: by redesignating subsections (q) through (v) as subsections (o) through (t), respectively.

subsection.text: Section 204 of the Energy Independence and Security Act of 2007 (42 U.S.C. 7545 note; Public Law 110–140) is repealed.

Effective beginning on the date of enactment of this Act, the regulations contained in subparts K and M of part 80 of title 40, Code of Federal Regulations (as in effect on that date of enactment), shall have no force or effect.
